rules.title: How to Play?
rules.pawnDesc: Moves forward one step. Captures diagonally!
rules.rookDesc: Moves in straight lines (up, down, left, right)!
rules.knightDesc: Jumps in an 'L' shape! Can jump over others.
rules.queenDesc: Moves in all directions! Very powerful!
rules.kingDesc: Most important! Usage one step in any direction. Don't lose him!
